ch0248_00_yarrow/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. You’ve
been working hard today.
ch0248_00_yarrow/0101_0701_02_10: It’s time to harvest the fruits of our training!
ch0248_00_yarrow/7101_0701_01_10:
I’m the Gym Leader of Turffield—a quiet,
easygoing town surrounded by farming fields.
ch0248_00_yarrow/7101_0701_02_10:
But it also has some mysterious standing stones
and a geoglyph, so we get a fair number of
tourists as well.
ch0248_00_yarrow/7102_0701_01_10:
I’m the first Gym Leader people face in the Galar
Gym Challenge.
ch0248_00_yarrow/7102_0701_02_10:
But when I’m up against a newbie Trainer, I can’t
help but want to treat them gently and help them
grow like a new sprout...
ch0248_00_yarrow/7102_0701_03_10:
That makes for pretty low difficulty, which I
suppose is perfect for the first Gym, huh.
ch0248_00_yarrow/7103_0701_01_10:
In both battling and farming, having a solid
foundation is key.
ch0248_00_yarrow/7103_0701_02_10:
In farming, that means preparing the soil!
In battling, I guess the equivalent would be daily
training and research, maybe?
ch0248_00_yarrow/7103_0701_03_10:
In order to bloom beautifully, you’ve got to be
patient and prepare diligently!
ch0248_00_yarrow/7104_0701_01_10:
Nessa and Kabu are good friends and rivals
of mine.
ch0248_00_yarrow/7104_0701_02_10:
The types we specialize in balance each other,
so we always try to support each other.
ch0248_00_yarrow/7105_0701_01_10:
Farming is a job that’s full of surprises. I think the
same applies to Pokémon battles and life in
general, too.
ch0248_00_yarrow/7105_0701_02_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! When you run into
obstacles, you’ve got to be tough as weeds!
ch0248_00_yarrow/7105_0701_03_10:
As long as you never give up, you’ll find a
way to work things out!
ch0248_00_yarrow/1701_0702_01_10:
I found it when I was working...but I figure you’d
make the item happier than I ever could!
ch0248_00_yarrow/2501_0701_01_10:
I’ve been farming with my Pokémon from a very
young age.
ch0248_00_yarrow/2501_0701_02_10:
As a result, I grew up big and strong, and I’ve
been able to hone my teamwork with my
Pokémon!
ch0248_00_yarrow/2501_0701_03_10:
Interested in farming with your partner Pokémon,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0248_00_yarrow/2501_0702_01_10: Back in Turffield, I take work nice and easy.
ch0248_00_yarrow/2501_0702_02_10:
I get to roll hay and run after Wooloo...
Doesn’t that sound fun?
ch0248_00_yarrow/2511_0701_01_10:
I’ve been able to have loads of serious battles
here on Pasio.
ch0248_00_yarrow/2511_0701_02_10:
That’s partly because there’re so many strong
Trainers here that I don’t have to hold back
against...
ch0248_00_yarrow/2511_0701_03_10:
But also, I just naturally go all out when I step in
to protect others from troublemakers like
Team Break.
ch0248_00_yarrow/2511_0702_01_10:
I can’t go all out in battles against newbie
Trainers, but even those are quite fun!
ch0248_00_yarrow/2511_0702_02_10:
You have to battle carefully, as if raising and
watching over a sprout...
ch0248_00_yarrow/2511_0702_03_10: all while hoping they grow big and strong!
ch0248_00_yarrow/3001_0701_01_10:
Have you had breakfast yet? I always give thanks
for all the food that nature has provided before
I eat.
ch0248_00_yarrow/3003_0701_01_10:
Pasio may be an artificial island, but it sure has
great soil. I bet I could grow scrumptious
Berries here!
ch0248_00_yarrow/3005_0701_01_10:
People are just like plants. We need plenty of
nutrients and good sleep to grow! Wait, do
plants sleep?
